nodes.name: Whitelist

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account that's not whitelisted.

addAddressToWhitelist
addAddressesToWhitelist

removeAddressesFromWhitelist
Whitelist

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account that's not whitelisted.
nodes.name: onlyWhitelisted
addAddressToWhitelist
addAddressesToWhitelist
removeAddressFromWhitelist
removeAddressesFromWhitelist

devdoc.details: The Whitelist contract has a whitelist of addresses, and provides basic authorization control functions.This simplifies the implementation of "user permissions".

addAddressToWhitelist(address).details: add an address to the whitelist
addAddressToWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was added to the whitelist, false if the address was already in the whitelist

addAddressesToWhitelist(address[]).return: true if at least one address was added to the whitelist, false if all addresses were already in the whitelist

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).details: remove an address from the whitelist
removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was removed from the whitelist, false if the address wasn't in the whitelist in the first place

removeAddressesFromWhitelist(address[]).return: true if at least one address was removed from the whitelist, false if all addresses weren't in the whitelist in the first place

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Whitelist
